chapter.text: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant (reference is made to Abraha, a Christian king of Yaman, who attacked Mecca with the army of elephants in the year of the Prophet Muhammadâ€™s birth)
Did He not make their treacherous plan a flop
And send against them flocks of birds
which pelted them with stones of baked clay
thus rendered them like the chewed- up chaff
